metadata.description: Azure resource ID of the subnet where this Redis instance is to be deployed

variables.documentation1: This sub-template is a workaround to the ARM if(,,)'s eager/call-by-value limitation that prevents us
variables.documentation2: from using the if(,,) in case redisDeploySwitch is false (the listKeys() is still evaluated because of the eager semantics).
variables.documentation3: This just returns 'None' as its only output that matches the redis.json template.
